question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.

Read each statement carefully and answer two questions about that statement. The first question asks how ANXIOUS or FEARFUL you feel in that situation. The second question asks how often you AVOID that situation. Please base your ratings on the way that the situations have affected you in the LAST WEEK, following the onset of the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area.
Acting, performing or giving a talk in front of an audience.
Calling someone you don't know very well.
Talking with people you don't know very well.
Entering a room when others are already seated.
Expressing a disagreement or disapproval to people you don't know very well.
Looking at people you don't know very well in the eyes.
Congratulations for completing this survey! Press finish to continue.
